about_the_game:
"GEODE CLIMB"



Take control of the creatures born from the depths of the earth, the Geode Climbers, and embark on an adventure through the tranquil world of geodes. Aim for the surface in this thrilling climbing-based jump-action adventure.



⦿ Set out on a journey through the expansive crystalline caverns underground.
Traverse six areas filled with captivating contraptions: flowing rivers of light, bouncy floors, cloud pathways, and more.

⦿ Your only ability is to jump. Master the art of jumping higher by controlling direction and force.

⦿ If you fail a jump and misstep, there's no turning back. You'll have to accept the agony of falling into the abyss, feeling utterly powerless.
The Geode Climbers are emptiness personified, and this world is unforgiving.

⦿ However, there are checkpoints along the way, and you can start over from the last checkpoint you passed by using gates.
Passing through a gate slightly alters the appearance of the Geode Climber, but that's of no concern.
Keep challenging yourself without giving up.

⦿ For those seeking high difficulty, try challenges without using gates or search for hidden checkpoints.
What will happen when you touch all the checkpoints...?

⦿ Geode Climbers are countless and shine in various hues.
Climb repeatedly and create your unique collection.

⦿ Keyboard, mouse, and gamepad controls are supported.
Enjoy the jump-action using the control method that suits you best.

name: GEODE CLIMB

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows7
  • Processor: Dual Core 2GHz
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Take control of the creatures born from the depths of the earth, the Geode Climbers, and embark on an adventure through the tranquil world of geodes. Aim for the surface in this thrilling climbing-based jump-action adventure.
supported_languages: Japanese, English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Ukrainian, Dutch, Greek, Swedish, Spanish - Latin America, Thai, Czech, Danish, Turkish, Norwegian, Hungarian, Finnish, Bulgarian, Vietnamese, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Polish, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean
